content: the three mandala thrill blanket is a fast fun weekend project that requires just three cakes of your favorite dk weight color-changing yarn perfect for lion brand mandala and lion brand mandala baby mix or match your colors and have fun no cutting of yarn cakes required go with the flow perfect as a first crochet blanket for a beginner for a fast project for a gift or as a project you can work on while you watch tv without having to think too much this is a beginner pattern and requires only chain slip_stitch and double_crochet stitches pattern is written in us terms and includes explanations of all stitches and abbreviations us and metric measurements given finished dimensions are about 33 by 42 inches 84 by 107 cm when using 3 cakes of lion brand mandala baby dk weight yarn and a 5 mm hook for a baby or toddler blanket requires 1 770 yards 1 616 meters of yarn pattern pdf includes detailed color photos of techniques for beginners how to do the c2c stitch and make a rectangular blanket a russian join tutorial for adding new skeins or working around knots yardage requirements links to video tutorials for beginners and left-handed crocheters please feel free to sell your finished items made with this pattern as long as you credit pretty peaceful for the pattern design and include a link to https //www etsy com/shop/prettypeaceful on the item whether you sell online or locally thank you for not distributing this pattern or using the photos within it as your own
